metadata.title: CVE-2021-38013 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in fingerprint recognition in Google Chrome onChromeOS prior to 96.0.4664.45 allowed a remote attacker who hadcompromised a WebUI renderer process to potentially perform a sandboxescape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
